channel.title: Manage money. Together. on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Manage money. Together. on Econumo

item.title: v0.1.0 Econumo Release
item.description: The first public release of Econumo. Econumo One: v0.1.0 Econumo Family: v0.1.0

item.title: Econumo Editions
item.description: Econumo Editions # Econumo provides versatile editions to meet various needs: Econumo CLOUD # Suited for individuals and families seeking convenience and access, this cloud-hosted solution offers a comprehensive suite of financial management tools available anytime, anywhere. Econumo FAMILY # Designed for households needing a self-hosted, collaborative approach, this platform supports up to 10 users, ensuring everyone stays aligned financially. Econumo ONE # Tailored for solo users who prefer a self-hosted solution, this free platform delivers powerful financial management features for those who prioritize privacy and control over their budgeting.

item.title: Multi-Currency support
item.description: Multi-Currency Support # Econumo offers multi-currency functionality. To get started, you need to: Load currencies into your Econumo instance. Set up a daily update for currency rates. To simplify this process, we have developed a tool that updates currencies and exchange rates using data from https://openexchangerates.org. You can find the tool here: https://github.com/econumo/currency-loader Installation # Register at https://openexchangerates.org and generate your API keys. Clone the repository or download the binary file from the releases page.

item.title: Contact us
item.description: Contact us # Please use GitHub discussions to talk about the roadmap, features, and bugs. For billing-related inquiries or partnership opportunities, email econumo@gmail.com.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions # Do you have plans to add automated import of transactions from banks? # Automated import of transactions from banks and other sources is not a priority at this point. However, it might be added in the future as an optional feature. If you have development skills and want to contribute, you are welcome to do so by using Econumo’s API.
